channel.title: [Class Suggestions] Groundskeeper, Lurker and Paranoid
channel.description:
Bringing back this old gem ;)
**The Groundskeeper (BD Killer)**
Passive 1: Awareness Immune to Occupy
Night Ability 1: On Watch (2 uses) Kill anyone who trespasses on your land. Bypasses immunity
Night Ability 2: Sweep the Castle (1 use) You will leave your room, unable to be killed (Death immune for the night)
Day Ability: Invitation (1 use) Redirect somebody to visit you tonight
------
**The Lurker (Unseen Offensive)**
Passive 1: Awareness Immune to Occupy
Night Ability 1: Home Conversion (1 use) Invite the Mastermind to your room tonight to attempt to convert somebody visiting your room
Day Ability 1: Invitation (2 uses) Redirect somebody to visit you tonight
-----
**The Paranoid (Neutral Killer)**
Passive 1: Isolated Immune to Occupy + Death + Convert
Passive 2: Freak Accident You attack somebody at random if you do not use any day or night ability
Night Ability 1: Paranoia (3 uses) Kill anyone who enters your room. Bypasses immunity
Night Ability 2: Disguised Strike (3 uses) You will attack somebody under the guise of another. (Will show somebody else other than you visiting your victim)
Day Ability 1: Meat Shield (3 uses) Redirect somebody to your room tonight and will be killed instead of you if you are attacked
